description: Zander Craze and Damon Heart first sampled each other in the Lucas Entertainment film “Raw Threeway’’ where Viktor Rom received two uncut European men for the price of one. Now Zander and Damon have a chance to suck and fuck their brains out one-on-one and uninterrupted. Damon is always up for stretching his throat out on a big uncut dick, and if there’s one thing we know about Zander Craze, it’s what he’s packing in the pants. As for ass-fucking: neither Zander Craze or Damon Heart is content with being all bottom or all top -- no ass goes un-fucked in this scene.
title: Zander Craze And Damon Heart | Fucking In The Shade
